items.title: 10 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stocks Down Over 10% to Buy and Hold Forever
items.author: Neha Chamaria
items.description: The article highlights 10 S&P 500 dividend stocks with strong financial performance, consistent dividend growth, and potential for long-term investment across various sectors including healthcare, energy, utilities, and technology.
